amendment.description: To preserve the Federal Regulatory Commission's authority to protect the public interest prior to July 1, 2005.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 1418 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 54 - 44. Record Vote Number: 314.

Amendment SA 1418 proposed by Senator Bingaman to Amendment SA 1412. (consideration: CR S10125-10133; text: CR S10125) To preserve the Federal Regulatory Commission's authority to protect the public interest prior to July 1, 2005.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 1418 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 54 - 44. Record Vote Number: 314.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1418 proposed by Senator Bingaman to Amendment SA 1412.
